name: GlassFox - dimmer on/off
description: Use this together with the theme GlassFox http://userstyles.org/styles/45089/glassfox-a-clean-theme
additional_info:
By enable/disable this style you can turn on extra "light" on the inactive tabs to make them more visible.

Can be useful in combination with GlassFox http://userstyles.org/styles/45089/glassfox-a-clean-theme 

Try also GlassFox - change text color http://userstyles.org/styles/45746/glassfox-change-text-color
and GlassFox - stamped tabs http://userstyles.org/styles/46157/glassfox-stamped-tabs?r=1302031937
